snippet.title: Game Review: Samurai Warriors Chronicles
snippet.description: Historical hack-and-slash game with moderate violence.

snippet.title: Game Review: Madden NFL Football - 3DS
snippet.description: Fun, feature-rich 3D football game for gamers on the go.

snippet.title: Game Review: The Sims 3 (3DS)
snippet.description: First Sims game in 3-D is still intended for older players.

snippet.title: Game Review: Steel Diver
snippet.description: Clever submarine sim takes advantage of 3DS hardware.

snippet.title: Game Review: Pilotwings Resort
snippet.description: Enjoyable flying adventure shows off the graphics of 3DS.

snippet.title: Game Review: Ridge Racer 3D
snippet.description: Racer focuses on driving rather than crashes or weapons.

snippet.title: Game Review: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 3D
snippet.description: Disappointing soccer simulator with so-so 3-D effects.

snippet.title: Game Review: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars 3D
snippet.description: Clever puzzle-action title with 3D effects, some violence.

snippet.title: Game Review: Super Monkey Ball 3D
snippet.description: Three-in-one game has good value, mild cartoon violence.
